fun: A fun command, that has nothing to do with reality, just displays your smart percentage, a random number between 1 and 100. Returns the smartness of the user if given.
A fun command, that has nothing to do with reality, just displays your gayness, a random number between 1 and 100. Returns the gayness of the user if given.
Displays the user's avatar if given or your own in GIF format.
Displays a random response to your question.
Displays a random meme from reddits and sub reddits.
Creates a poll for your question.
moderation: Mutes a user. You need the manage messages permission to use this command.
Bans a user. Requires ban members permission.
Unbans a user. Requires ban members permission.
Unmutes a user. You need the manage messages permission to use this command.
Kicks a user. Requires kick members permission.
economy: Returns the total money the user has if given or it returns yours.
You will get a random amount of money.
information: It returns the invite link for the bot.
It return the latency of the bot.
Returns the current version of the bot.
